product_name: Perseus Book Group (Pbg) 101 Great Hikes of the San Francisco Bay Area - 5th Edition
long_description: From hikes atop Mount Diablo to seashore strolls at Point Reyes, 101 Great Hikes of the San Francisco Bay Area helps you discover the natural beauty of this diverse region by foot.
short_description: From hikes atop Mount Diablo to seashore strolls at Point Reyes, 101 Great Hikes of the San Francisco Bay Area helps you discover the natural beauty of this diverse region by foot.
